pitch.cc: Chris Carpenter has thrown 88 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 93 over the past 10 pitches.
Dangerous count for Chris Carpenter; Alex Gordon is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .922 OPS against them this season and .790 against everything else.
Chris Carpenter is really trying to keep Mitch Maier close; he is 1-for-1 in stolen base attempts this season.
